sections.changelog:
2.0.0 – June 21, 2025

  • New: Site Loader element
  • New: Arrow Button v4 element
  • New: Arrow Button v5 element
  • New: Arrow Button v6 element
  • New: Arrow Button v7 element
  • New: Arrow Button v8 element
  • New: Audio Player element
  • New: Before/After Image v2 element
  • New: Blurry Button element
  • New: Bubbles Button element
  • New: Crosshair element
  • New: Dot Button element
  • New: Dot Button v2 element
  • New: Dot Button v3 element
  • New: FlipFlop Button element
  • New: FlipFlop Button v2 element
  • New: FlipFlop Button v3 element
  • New: Highlight element
  • New: Image Reveal v2 element
  • New: Image Reveal v3 element
  • New: Image Reveal v4 element
  • New: Interactive Lines v2 element
  • New: Interactive Lines v3 element
  • New: Interactive Lines v4 element
  • New: Lightbox element
  • New: Link Preview element
  • New: Link Preview element
  • New: Looping Tabs element
  • New: Nudge Button element
  • New: Overlay Shadows element
  • New: Pixels Button element
  • New: Prism Button v2 element
  • New: Read More element
  • New: Reel Button element
  • New: Ripple Button v4 element
  • New: Ripple Button v5 element
  • New: Ripple Button v6 element
  • New: Ripple Button v7 element
  • New: Scrolling Background element
  • New: Scrolling Gallery element
  • New: Squeezy Radius Button element
  • New: Stories element
  • New: Stretchy Button element
  • New: Strip Button element
  • New: Stripes Button element
  • New: Thumbnail Slider element
  • Improve: Allowed Tabs inside Tabs and improved accessibility
  • Fix: Highlight Hover will now take the whole block on line breaks

1.3.1 – March 31, 2025

  • Improve: Support to percentaje units in Physics element positions
  • Improve: Mask Hover clip path bug in the latest Chrome update
  • Improve: GSAP ScrollSmoother anchor links
  • Fix: Blur Reading brightness causing a dark shadow on colorful backgrounds
  • Fix: Dock menu animation when using large Dock items

1.3 – February 19, 2025

  • New: Shading Lines Title element
  • New: Looping Lines v2 element
  • New: Dynamic Copyright element
  • New: Proximity Hover element
  • New: Swap Reading element
  • New: Rainbow Button element
  • New: Interactive Lines element
  • New: Distorsion Tabs element
  • New: Cursor Trail element
  • New: Toolteam element
  • New: Toast element
  • New: Decode Card element
  • New: Progress Bar v2 element
  • New: Tiles v2 element
  • New: Multiple inverted corners at Inverted Corner element
  • New: Translate Y and Skew controls at Blur Reveal
  • New: Custom links to Physics objects
  • New: Prefix at Looping lines
  • New: Custom HTML tags at Buttons elements
  • New: Control to change the color of the Fluids element
  • New: Control to disable the whole Fluids element or only the entrance animation at touch devices
  • Improve: Added % unit at show distance at Before/After Image element
  • Improve: Before/After Image element will update its thumb when the window is manually resized
  • Improve: Wrap specific words into HTML tags at elements being splitted by SplitText
  • Improve: Fluids performance at mobile agents
  • Improve: Fluids hover animation applied when mouse is over elements above Fluids content
  • Improve: Added all units to CSS controls that could support them
  • Fix: Text domain warning from SureCart SDK

1.2 – January 7, 2025

  • Improve: Builder speed and performance when working with Dancepad elements
  • Improve: CSS loading size of all elements
  • Improve: GSAP and ScrollTrigger libraries from Dancepad were replaced with those from Breakdance

1.1.1 – January 3, 2025

  • New: Arrow Button inverted direction when having a link

1.1 – December 31, 2024

  • New: Dynamic Island element
  • New: Pixels Shimmer Card element
  • New: Text Shimmer element
  • New: Focus Nav element
  • New: Gooey Nav element
  • New: Infinite Slider element
  • New: Shiny Button element
  • New: Arrow Button v2 element
  • New: Arrow Button v3 element
  • Fix: Morphing Nav page name as active item
